## Events.SignerLockedEvent interface

A callback notification indicates that a signer has been locked out due to repeated SMS/Q&amp;A authentication failures.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default interface SignerLockedEvent 
```

## Remarks

- [Setting Up Callback Notifications (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/feature-guides/developer/setting-callback-notifications)
